verses.kjv: And take thou unto thee Aaron thy brother, and his sons with him, from among the children of Israel, that he may minister unto me in the priest’s office, even Aaron, Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar, Aaron’s sons.
verses.ct: "Bring your brother Aaron and his sons from among the Israelites so that he can serve me as priest — Aaron along with his sons Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make holy garments for Aaron thy brother for glory and for beauty.
verses.ct: "Make sacred clothing for your brother Aaron that will be glorious and beautiful."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt speak unto all that are wise hearted, whom I have filled with the spirit of wisdom, that they may make Aaron’s garments to consecrate him, that he may minister unto me in the priest’s office.
verses.ct: "Talk to all the skilled craftspeople — the ones I have filled with the spirit of wisdom — and have them create Aaron's garments to set him apart, so he can serve me as priest."

verses.kjv: And these are the garments which they shall make; a breastplate, and an ephod, and a robe, and a broidered coat, a mitre, and a girdle: and they shall make holy garments for Aaron thy brother, and his sons, that he may minister unto me in the priest’s office.
verses.ct: "These are the garments they are to create: a breastpiece, an ephod, a robe, a woven tunic, a turban, and a sash. They will make these sacred garments for your brother Aaron and his sons so that he can serve me as priest."

verses.kjv: And they shall take gold, and blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen.
verses.ct: "They are to use gold thread, blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, and fine linen."

verses.kjv: And they shall make the ephod of gold, of blue, and of purple, of scarlet, and fine twined linen, with cunning work.
verses.ct: "They are to craft the ephod from gold thread, blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, and finely twisted linen, all skillfully worked."

verses.kjv: It shall have the two shoulderpieces thereof joined at the two edges thereof; and so it shall be joined together.
verses.ct: "It must have 2 shoulder straps attached at its 2 edges, joining it together."

verses.kjv: And the curious girdle of the ephod, which is upon it, shall be of the same, according to the work thereof; even of gold, of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen.
verses.ct: "The decorative waistband that is attached to the ephod must be made the same way — from gold thread, blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, and finely twisted linen."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt take two onyx stones, and grave on them the names of the children of Israel:
verses.ct: "Take 2 onyx stones and engrave on them the names of the sons of Israel."

verses.kjv: Six of their names on one stone, and the other six names of the rest on the other stone, according to their birth.
verses.ct: "Put 6 names on one stone and the remaining 6 names on the other stone, arranged in birth order."

verses.kjv: With the work of an engraver in stone, like the engravings of a signet, shalt thou engrave the two stones with the names of the children of Israel: thou shalt make them to be set in ouches of gold.
verses.ct: "Have a gem cutter engrave the 2 stones with the names of the sons of Israel, just like a seal is engraved. Then mount them in gold settings."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put the two stones upon the shoulders of the ephod for stones of memorial unto the children of Israel: and Aaron shall bear their names before the LORD upon his two shoulders for a memorial.
verses.ct: "Attach the 2 stones to the shoulder straps of the ephod as reminder stones for the Israelites. Aaron will carry their names on his shoulders in the LORD's presence as a reminder."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make ouches of gold;
verses.ct: "Make gold settings,"

verses.kjv: And two chains of pure gold at the ends; of wreathen work shalt thou make them, and fasten the wreathen chains to the ouches.
verses.ct: "and 2 chains of pure gold, braided like cords. Then attach the braided chains to the settings."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make the breastplate of judgment with cunning work; after the work of the ephod thou shalt make it; of gold, of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet, and of fine twined linen, shalt thou make it.
verses.ct: "Make a breastpiece for decisions, crafted with the same skill as the ephod. Construct it from gold thread, blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, and finely twisted linen."

verses.kjv: Foursquare it shall be being doubled; a span shall be the length thereof, and a span shall be the breadth thereof.
verses.ct: "It must be square when folded double, about 9 inches long and 9 inches wide."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt set in it settings of stones, even four rows of stones: the first row shall be a sardius, a topaz, and a carbuncle: this shall be the first row.
verses.ct: "Mount 4 rows of precious stones on it. The first row should have a ruby, a topaz, and a garnet."

verses.kjv: And the second row shall be an emerald, a sapphire, and a diamond.
verses.ct: "The 2nd row should have an emerald, a sapphire, and a diamond."

verses.kjv: And the third row a ligure, an agate, and an amethyst.
verses.ct: "The 3rd row should have a jacinth, an agate, and an amethyst."

verses.kjv: And the fourth row a beryl, and an onyx, and a jasper: they shall be set in gold in their inclosings.
verses.ct: "The 4th row should have a beryl, an onyx, and a jasper. Each stone must be mounted in a gold setting."

verses.kjv: And the stones shall be with the names of the children of Israel, twelve, according to their names, like the engravings of a signet; every one with his name shall they be according to the twelve tribes.
verses.ct: "There will be 12 stones total, one for each name of the sons of Israel. Each stone must be engraved like a seal with the name of one of the 12 tribes."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make upon the breastplate chains at the ends of wreathen work of pure gold.
verses.ct: "For the breastpiece, make braided chains of pure gold, like cords."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make upon the breastplate two rings of gold, and shalt put the two rings on the two ends of the breastplate.
verses.ct: "Also make 2 gold rings and attach them to the 2 upper corners of the breastpiece."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put the two wreathen chains of gold in the two rings which are on the ends of the breastplate.
verses.ct: "Thread the 2 gold braided chains through the 2 rings at the corners of the breastpiece."

verses.kjv: And the other two ends of the two wreathen chains thou shalt fasten in the two ouches, and put them on the shoulderpieces of the ephod before it.
verses.ct: "Connect the other ends of the 2 braided chains to the 2 gold settings, and attach them to the front of the ephod's shoulder straps."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make two rings of gold, and thou shalt put them upon the two ends of the breastplate in the border thereof, which is in the side of the ephod inward.
verses.ct: "Make 2 more gold rings and attach them to the 2 lower corners of the breastpiece, on the inner edge that faces the ephod."

verses.kjv: And two other rings of gold thou shalt make, and shalt put them on the two sides of the ephod underneath, toward the forepart thereof, over against the other coupling thereof, above the curious girdle of the ephod.
verses.ct: "Make another 2 gold rings and attach them to the lower front of the ephod's shoulder straps, near the seam and just above the decorative waistband."

verses.kjv: And they shall bind the breastplate by the rings thereof unto the rings of the ephod with a lace of blue, that it may be above the curious girdle of the ephod, and that the breastplate be not loosed from the ephod.
verses.ct: "The breastpiece must be tied by its rings to the rings of the ephod with a blue cord, keeping it positioned above the decorative waistband so the breastpiece won't come loose from the ephod."

verses.kjv: And Aaron shall bear the names of the children of Israel in the breastplate of judgment upon his heart, when he goeth in unto the holy place, for a memorial before the LORD continually.
verses.ct: "Whenever Aaron enters the holy place, he will carry the names of the sons of Israel over his heart on the breastpiece of decisions, as a constant reminder in the LORD's presence."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put in the breastplate of judgment the Urim and the Thummim; and they shall be upon Aaron’s heart, when he goeth in before the LORD: and Aaron shall bear the judgment of the children of Israel upon his heart before the LORD continually.
verses.ct: "Place the Urim and the Thummim inside the breastpiece of decisions so they rest over Aaron's heart whenever he comes into the LORD's presence. In this way, Aaron will always carry the means of making decisions for the Israelites over his heart in the LORD's presence."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make the robe of the ephod all of blue.
verses.ct: "Make the robe that goes under the ephod entirely from blue fabric."

verses.kjv: And there shall be an hole in the top of it, in the midst thereof: it shall have a binding of woven work round about the hole of it, as it were the hole of an habergeon, that it be not rent.
verses.ct: "It must have an opening at the top for the head, with a woven collar around the opening — like the collar on a coat of armor — so it won't tear."

verses.kjv: And beneath upon the hem of it thou shalt make pomegranates of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet, round about the hem thereof; and bells of gold between them round about:
verses.ct: "Along the bottom hem, attach pomegranates made of blue, purple, and scarlet yarn all the way around, with gold bells placed between them."

verses.kjv: A golden bell and a pomegranate, a golden bell and a pomegranate, upon the hem of the robe round about.
verses.ct: "The pattern around the hem should alternate: a gold bell, then a pomegranate, then a gold bell, then a pomegranate, all the way around."

verses.kjv: And it shall be upon Aaron to minister: and his sound shall be heard when he goeth in unto the holy place before the LORD, and when he cometh out, that he die not.
verses.ct: "Aaron must wear this robe when he serves. The bells will ring as he enters and exits the holy place in the LORD's presence, so that he won't die."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make a plate of pure gold, and grave upon it, like the engravings of a signet, HOLINESS TO THE LORD.
verses.ct: "Make a medallion of pure gold and engrave on it like a seal: HOLY TO THE LORD."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put it on a blue lace, that it may be upon the mitre; upon the forefront of the mitre it shall be.
verses.ct: "Fasten it to the front of the turban with a blue cord."

verses.kjv: And it shall be upon Aaron’s forehead, that Aaron may bear the iniquity of the holy things, which the children of Israel shall hallow in all their holy gifts; and it shall be always upon his forehead, that they may be accepted before the LORD.
verses.ct: "It will rest on Aaron's forehead, and Aaron will take on any guilt connected to the sacred offerings that the Israelites consecrate as their holy gifts. It must always be on his forehead so that the offerings will be accepted in the LORD's presence."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt embroider the coat of fine linen, and thou shalt make the mitre of fine linen, and thou shalt make the girdle of needlework.
verses.ct: "Weave the tunic from fine linen, make the turban from fine linen, and craft the sash with embroidered work."

verses.kjv: And for Aaron’s sons thou shalt make coats, and thou shalt make for them girdles, and bonnets shalt thou make for them, for glory and for beauty.
verses.ct: "For Aaron's sons, make tunics, sashes, and headbands that are glorious and beautiful."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put them upon Aaron thy brother, and his sons with him; and shalt anoint them, and consecrate them, and sanctify them, that they may minister unto me in the priest’s office.
verses.ct: "Dress your brother Aaron and his sons in these garments, then anoint them, ordain them, and set them apart as holy so they can serve me as priests."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make them linen breeches to cover their nakedness; from the loins even unto the thighs they shall reach:
verses.ct: "Also make linen undergarments for them to cover their bare skin, reaching from the waist to the thighs."

verses.kjv: And they shall be upon Aaron, and upon his sons, when they come in unto the tabernacle of the congregation, or when they come near unto the altar to minister in the holy place; that they bear not iniquity, and die: it shall be a statute for ever unto him and his seed after him.
verses.ct: "Aaron and his sons must wear these whenever they enter the tent of meeting or approach the altar to serve in the holy place. Otherwise they will bear guilt and die. This is a permanent regulation for Aaron and all his descendants after him."
